schools.name: Lincoln Elementary School
schools.school-summary: Lincoln Elementary School, a public school located in Dixmoor, IL, serves grades PK-K in the W Harvey-Dixmoor Public School District 147 School District.
schools.district-name: W Harvey-Dixmoor Public School District 147 School District
schools.rating-description: The GreatSchools Rating helps parents compare schools within a state based on a variety of school quality indicators and provides a helpful picture of how effectively each school serves all of its students. Ratings are on a scale of 1 (below average) to 10 (above average) and can include test scores, college readiness, academic progress, advanced courses, equity, discipline and attendance data. We also advise parents to visit schools, consider other information on school performance and programs, and consider family needs as part of the school selection process.

schools.name: Martin L King Elementary School
schools.school-summary: Martin L King Elementary School, a public school located in Dixmoor, IL, serves grades 1-4 in the W Harvey-Dixmoor Public School District 147 School District.It has received a GreatSchools Rating of 4 out of 10, based on a variety of school quality measures.

schools.name: Rosa L Parks Middle School
schools.school-summary: Rosa L Parks Middle School, a public school located in Dixmoor, IL, serves grades 5-8 in the W Harvey-Dixmoor Public School District 147 School District.It has received a GreatSchools Rating of 3 out of 10, based on a variety of school quality measures.
